00025 #ifndef B3_GJK_EPA2_H
00026 #define B3_GJK_EPA2_H
00027 
00028 #include "Bullet3Common/b3AlignedObjectArray.h"

00030 #include "Bullet3Collision/NarrowPhaseCollision/shared/b3ConvexPolyhedronData.h"

00032 
00034 struct  b3GjkEpaSolver2
00035 {
00036 struct  sResults
00037         {
00038         enum eStatus
00039                 {
00040                 Separated,              /* Shapes doesnt penetrate                                                                                              */ 
00041                 Penetrating,    /* Shapes are penetrating                                                                                               */ 
00042                 GJK_Failed,             /* GJK phase fail, no big issue, shapes are probably just 'touching'    */ 
00043                 EPA_Failed              /* EPA phase fail, bigger problem, need to save parameters, and debug   */ 
00044                 }               status;
00045         b3Vector3       witnesses[2];
00046         b3Vector3       normal;
00047         b3Scalar        distance;
00048         };
00049 
00050 static int              StackSizeRequirement();
00051 
00052 static bool             Distance(        const b3Transform&     transA, const b3Transform&      transB,
00053                                                         const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullA, const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullB, 
00054                                                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesA,
00055                                                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesB,
00056                                                         const b3Vector3& guess,
00057                                                         sResults& results);
00058

00060                                                         const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullA, const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullB, 
00061                                                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesA,
00062                                                         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesB,
00063                                                         const b3Vector3& guess,
00064                                                         sResults& results,
00065                                                         bool usemargins=true);
00066 #if 0
